title: Bug Regarding World championship icon
body: i recently unlocked the golden icon after collecting 10 jewels then i collected another 10 to unlock the platinum icon but it wasnot there , what should i do ?

replies.body: The World Championship icon doesn't have a higher tier or special animations like team icons do.  You can obtain team icons for full upgrade through the store, under accessories then summoner icons.  Hope that helps!
Thank you for the help i thought it was somekind of a bug
